function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The study involves analyzing energy consumption in buildings. This could be a potential indicator of building occupancy and human activity, both of which contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unexpected energy consumption in unoperated buildings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minimal energy usage during lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurement of basal eui","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Violation of lockdown measures leading to increased building occupancy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate reporting of building occupancy during the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of safety protocols for in-situ visits to buildings during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced occupancy leading to continuous operation of systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Energy consumption variations due to lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measured energy consumption of refrigerators","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouragement of telemedicine service instead of visiting clinics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small health centers not attending covid-19 patients directly","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical average energy use decrease due to lockdown measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High energy use in buildings, impacting the environment and resources","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible waste patterns in energy use during diminished occupancy","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of occupant presence and actions on total energy use in buildings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in energy consumption in health centers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in energy consumption in buildings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Zero energy consumption in some buildings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced occupancy in buildings during lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous operation of data processing rooms with servers and racks in administrative building","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Equipment left in stand-by mode","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous operation of equipment such as refrigerators and stand-by plug loads in elementary and nursery schools","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty and variations in energy consumption may not be considered in the eui estimation model, leading to discrepancies between estimated and actual values.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unnecessary stand-by plug loads, such as computers, contributing to high energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Empty refrigerators contributing to high energy consumption","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unoccupied building leading to higher risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Abnormal energy use intensity in municipal buildings during lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in energy performance of buildings based on cultural and social aspects","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of activities leading to systems being left turned on in buildings.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Organizational culture contributing to baseline energy consumption during unoccupied periods.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residual energy consumption due to community use of the building during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential
